description_for_human: Run your code directly from chat.
description_for_model: A plugin for executing Python, C++, and Rust code. You can use the `/v1/repl` endpoint to execute code based on user input or when a user asks for assistance with programming-related tasks. When presenting a media file created via a command or code execution, use the corresponding `http://codesherpa.app/static/images/` URL to embed it in the response.
